name: Fetch (itch) (SSibai)
description:
Fetch - فتّش is a puzzle platformer that uses object recognition as a main mechanic. the player has to scan objects from their surroundings that they think would help them solve puzzles and overcome obstacles.

Object recognition is unavailable for this build. 

Controls: Move with D & A. Jump and attack with Space.

Interact with objects with mouse left click. 

Developed by Salam Sibai
